name: agentic-creator-skills
description: ACOS — Agentic Creator OS. Modular plugins for independent creators, personal brands, and creative businesses. Content engine, visual studio, music lab, brand voice, product launching, and intelligence systems.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: ACOS core — workspace memory (CREATOR.md + creator-memory/), task management (TASKS.md), creator-sprint initialization, and ACOS score reporting. Install this first.

plugins.name: content-engine
plugins.description: Voice-consistent content creation across blog posts, social media, newsletters, and video scripts. Multi-channel format rules, repurposing workflows, SEO checklist, and newsletter generation.

plugins.name: visual-studio
plugins.description: Style-governed image generation with 7-gate quality filter. Visual style DNA management, prompt engineering for all major AI image tools, and image catalog.

plugins.name: music-lab
plugins.description: AI music generation pipeline. Suno-compatible prompt engineering, style consistency across tracks, music purpose framework, and track catalog.

plugins.name: brand-architect
plugins.description: Brand voice system — define, document, and enforce consistent voice. Voice attribute framework, tone-by-channel rules, terminology management, and voice drift detection.

plugins.name: product-launcher
plugins.description: Creator product development and shipping. Spec writing, build sprints, QA process, deployment workflow, and post-launch retrospectives for digital products.

plugins.name: intelligence
plugins.description: ACOS intelligence and learning system. Session pattern tracking, skill activation scoring, trajectory learning, and full intelligence report.

plugins.name: document-skills
plugins.description: Collection of document processing suite including Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and PDF capabilities

plugins.name: example-skills
plugins.description: Collection of example skills demonstrating various capabilities including skill creation, MCP building, visual design, algorithmic art, internal communications, web testing, artifact building, Slack GIFs, and theme styling
